title: Enchant Crossbow Bolt

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Enchant Crossbow Bolt spell is a members-only spell used to give gem-tipped crossbow bolts special powers that have a chance of activating upon impact.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Enchant Crossbow Bolt
A player casting the Enchant Crossbow Bolt spell.
The interface of the spell Enchant Crossbow.

The Enchant Crossbow Bolt spell is a members-only spell used to give gem-tipped crossbow bolts special powers that have a chance of activating upon impact.

Although Enchant Crossbow Bolt is listed as one spell in a player's spellbook requiring 4 Magic to cast, the only bolts that can be enchanted at this level are Opal bolts. When attempting to cast Enchant Crossbow Bolt, an interface will appear, asking you to choose from 10 different spells. Each of these spells requires a different Magic level, different runes, and grants different amounts of experience.

Regardless of the spell cast or your Magic level, each spell enchants a set of 10 bolts. While this process is done at a set pace, you can hold down the space bar and rapidly click on the spell to speed up the process.

After completing the hard Kandarin Diary, enchanted bolts will have a 10% increased chance of the special effect activating (even in PvP).

Spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Spell Bolts created Magic Level Runes Required Experience Effect
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Opal) Opal bolts (e) 4 2 1 9 Lucky Lightning: Extra damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Sapphire) Sapphire bolts (e) 7 1 1 1 17 Clear Mind: Prayer siphon
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Jade) Jade bolts (e) 14 2 1 19 Earth's Fury: Opponent knockdown
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Pearl) Pearl bolts (e) 24 2 1 29 Sea Curse: Extra (water-based) damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Emerald) Emerald bolts (e) 27 3 1 1 37 Magical Poison: Greater chance of poison
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz) Topaz bolts (e) 29 2 1 33 Down to Earth: Lowers target's Magic (other players only)
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Ruby) Ruby bolts (e) 49 5 1 1 59 Blood Forfeit: -10% HP from self, -20% from target
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond) Diamond bolts (e) 57 10 1 2 67 Armour Piercing: Ignore much of target's ranged defence
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Dragonstone) Dragonstone bolts (e) 68 15 1 1 78 Dragon's Breath: Dragonbreath damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Onyx) Onyx bolts (e) 87 20 1 1 97 Life Leech: Extra damage, HP siphon

[[File:Enchanting crossbow bolts.png|thumb|The interface of the spell Enchant Crossbow.]]
The '''Enchant Crossbow Bolt''' spell is a [[members]]-only spell used to give gem-tipped [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] [[bolts]] special powers that have a chance of activating upon impact.

Although Enchant Crossbow Bolt is listed as one spell in a player's [[spellbook]] requiring 4 [[Magic]] to cast, the only bolts that can be enchanted at this level are Opal bolts. When attempting to cast Enchant Crossbow Bolt, an interface will appear, asking you to choose from 10 different [[spells]]. Each of these spells requires a different Magic level, different [[runes]], and grants different amounts of experience.

Regardless of the spell cast or your Magic level, each spell enchants a set of 10 bolts. While this process is done at a set pace, you can hold down the space bar and rapidly click on the spell to speed up the process.

After completing the [[hard Kandarin Diary]], enchanted bolts will have a 10% increased chance of the special effect activating (even in PvP).
